```{r}
npages <- 5 
price <- c()
title <- c()
links <- c()

url_template <- "https://leboutique.com/uk/catalog/women/dress?page="
```

```{r}
for (page in numbers) {
  
  url <- str_c (url_template)
 
  content <- read_html(url)
  
  title <- content %>%
    html_nodes('div.prod__name.crop') %>%
    html_text() %>%
    str_trim() %>%
    c(title, .)    
  
  price <- content %>%
    html_nodes('div.prod__price.color_fire') %>%
    html_text() %>%
    str_trim()  %>%
    c(price, .)
  
  links <- content %>%
    html_nodes('a.prod.prod_sold') %>%
    html_attr("href") %>%
    c(links, .)
  
  Sys.sleep(3)    
}
```

```{r}
data.frame(title = title,
           price = price,
           links = links) %>%
write.csv ("LeBoutiqueDress.csv")
            row.names = FALSE
```

```{r}
df <- read.csv("LeBoutiqueDress.csv")
df
```
